abstract: The 45,000 people who show up at Oracle's mammoth trade show are all potential sales targets. So why not show up, praise Oracle onstage, and go at it on the sales floor?
snippet: The 45,000 people who show up at Oracle's mammoth trade show are all potential sales targets. So why not show up, praise Oracle onstage, and go at it on the sales floor?

headline.main: Keep Your Tech Friends Close, but Keep Your Enemies Closer
